title: Accordion
description: A collapsible component for displaying content in a vertical stack.
content:
Anatomy

Understanding the Accordion's anatomy is crucial for proper setup:

Each component part is marked with a data-part attribute for easy DOM identification.

Usage

Here is how you use this with multiple

// [!code highlight:2]
<Accordion.Root multiple>
  <Accordion.Item value="item-1">
    …
  </Accordion.Item>
  <Accordion.Item value="item-2">
    …
  </Accordion.Item>
</AccordionRoot>
